regression¶

Classes¶

CWPath¶

class regreg.regression.CWPath(problem, **kwargs)¶

Bases: regreg.regression.Regression

__init__(problem, **kwargs)¶
fit(tol=0.0001, inner_its=50, max_its=2000, min_its=5)¶
output¶

Return the ‘interesting’ part of the problem arguments. In the regression case, this is the tuple (beta, r).

stop(previous, tol=0.0001, return_worst=False)¶

Convergence check: check whether residuals have not significantly changed or they are small enough.

Both old and current are expected to be (beta, r) tuples, i.e. regression coefficent and residual tuples.
